member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO
member.summary: The CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO structure contains a signed data content type in Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) format.

summary.para: A DWORD value that specifies the version of the time stamp request.

listheader.description: Specifies that this is a version 1 time stamp request.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.pszTSAPolicyId
member.summary: Optional. A pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the Time Stamping Authority (TSA) policy under which the time stamp token was provided. This value must correspond with the value passed in the structure.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.HashAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the algorithm used to calculate the hash. This value must correspond with the value passed in the structure.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.HashedMessage
member.summary: A structure that specifies the hash values to be time stamped.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.SerialNumber
member.summary: A CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB structure that contains the serial number assigned by the TSA to each time stamp token.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.ftTime
member.summary: A value that specifies the time at which the time stamp token was produced by the TSA.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.pvAccuracy
member.summary: Optional. A pointer to a structure that contains the time deviation around the UTC time at which the time stamp token was created by the TSA.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.Nonce
member.summary: Optional. A CRYPT_DER_BLOB structure that contains the nonce value used by the client to verify the timeliness of the response when no local clock is available. This value must correspond with the value passed in the structure.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.Tsa
member.summary: Optional. A CRYPT_DER_BLOB structure that contains the subject name of the TSA certificate.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the array pointed to by the rgExtension member.

member.name: CRYPT_TIMESTAMP_INFO.rgExtension
member.summary: A pointer to an array of structures that contain extension information returned from the request.
